title: How to Use a Knife and Steel
description: Mike Evensen from Better Meat Company shows what a knife steel is and how to use it to keep your knifes nice and straight.

asset.title: How to Use a Knife and Steel
asset.description: Mike Evensen from Better Meat Company shows what a knife steel is and how to use it to keep your knifes nice and straight.
asset.author: Char-Broil Grills

transcripts: Butcher’s trade secret knives and steels. All of Steel is meant to do is to straighten an edge that rolled over on the knife is not meant to sharpen the knife it’s just meant to true it. You want to steel it as a smooth edge not an abrasive edge like a file and usually two passes is that all it takes to straighten that edge up so it’s sharp again .
